resources.string: The Nyjah Huston Collaboration deck from Element and Diamond Supply Cois a Featherlight 8" skateboard deck built to Nyjah's exact specs.
DGK To The Limit 8.25" Skateboard Deck
Push your skills to the limit with a slight concave shape for solid pop and a palm tree print DGK text graphic.
Real Wair Spirit Guide 7.75" Skateboard Deck
Improve your skate skills with a solid concave shape for crisp pop and Real\'s R1 7-ply maple construction for improved strength and longer lasting pop.
Plan B Sheckler Store Front 8.25" Skateboard Deck
Take to the streets with this durable 7-ply maple deck made with slight concave for added pop and a Ryan Sheckler tattoo parlor inspired graphic at the bottom.

Bring a demonic look to your setup with the Peter Ramondetta pro model Icon skateboard deck from Real. A black to gold fade with an all over goat head and pentagram icon graphics will give your tricks some added style and durable 7-ply maple construction with medium concave to help your trick get more poppy lift.
